00024 namespace DbjTraceManagerAlloc
00025 {
00028     template<class T>
00029     class PerformanceAllocator {
00030       public:
00031         typedef T value_type;
00032         typedef size_t size_type;
00033         typedef ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00034         typedef T * pointer;
00035         typedef const T * const_pointer;
00036         typedef T & reference;
00037         typedef const T & const_reference;
00038 
00039         pointer address(reference obj) const { return &obj; }
00040         const_pointer address(const_reference obj) const { return &obj; }
00041 
00042         PerformanceAllocator() { }
00043         PerformanceAllocator(const  PerformanceAllocator<T>&) { }
00044         template<class U>
00045         PerformanceAllocator(const  PerformanceAllocator<U>&) { }
00046         ~PerformanceAllocator() { }
00047         template<class U>
00048         PerformanceAllocator<T> &operator=(const  PerformanceAllocator<U>&)
00049               { return *this; }
00050 
00051         template<class U>
00052         pointer allocate(size_type n, U const *) const
00053               { return static_cast<pointer>(malloc(n * sizeof(T))); }
00054         pointer allocate(size_type n) const
00055               { return static_cast<pointer>(malloc(n * sizeof(T))); }
00056         void deallocate(pointer ptr, size_type /* n */) { free(ptr); }
00057 
00058         void construct(pointer ptr, T const &obj) { new (ptr) T(obj); }
00059         void destroy(pointer ptr) { ptr->~T(); }
00060         size_t max_size() const { return size_type(-1) / sizeof(T); }
00061 
00062         template<class U>
00063         struct rebind {
00064             typedef PerformanceAllocator<U> other;
00065         };
00066     };
00067 
00069     template<>
00070     class PerformanceAllocator<void> {
00071       public:
00072         typedef void value_type;
00073         typedef void * pointer;
00074         typedef void const * const_pointer;
00075         // no references possible
00076 
00077         template<class U>
00078         struct rebind {
00079             typedef PerformanceAllocator<U> other;
00080         };
00081     };
00082 } /* DbjTraceManagerAlloc */

00222     struct TimeValue : public timeval {
00224         TimeValue() { gettimeofday(this, NULL); }
00227         TimeValue operator+(TimeValue const &addTime) const;
00230         TimeValue operator-(TimeValue const &subTime) const;
00232         inline TimeValue &operator=(TimeValue const &other)
00233               { tv_sec = other.tv_sec; tv_usec = other.tv_usec; return *this; }
00236         inline TimeValue &operator+=(TimeValue addTime)
00237               { *this = *this + addTime; return *this; }
00239         inline void setZero() { tv_sec = 0; tv_usec = 0; }

00259     class StringLessThan {
00260       public:
00262         bool operator()(const char* s1, const char* s2) const
00263               { return strcmp(s1, s2) < 0 ? true : false; }
00264     };
